newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Dadonghai reaps 59 mln yuan 96 net.
newsitem.headline: Dadonghai reaps 59 mln yuan 96 net.

text.p: Hainan Dadonghai Tourism Centre (Holdings) Co Ltd had net profits of 59.22 million yuan in 1996, the Shenzhen Stock Exchange said in a notice after the market closed on Tuesday.
Earnings per share were 0.185 yuan and turnover reached 119.76 million in 1996, the exchange said.
It did not reveal whether the figures were based on Chinese or international accounting standards. It did not give comparative figures.
In 1995, the company posted net profits of 39.90 million yuan on turnover of 98.11 million under international accounting standards.
The company proposed no dividend for 1996, the exchange said.
Trading in Dadonghai's A and B shares will be suspended on Wednesday morning and will resume in the aftennoon, it said.
